data.name: VR Horror Stories
data.description:
"VR Horror Stories" is a collection of unique high-quality 360° videos with spatialized audio that are perfect for spooking all horror fans. It includes 13 short horror videos (33 minutes total) with immersive spooky sound. Explore dialogue-free scary experiences and English narrative stories with multilingual subtitles support through a user-friendly interface for seamless navigation and enjoyment. (Chinese, French, German,  Hindi, Japanese and Spanish subtitles)

Our 360 VR short horror stories are the perfect way to get your heart racing. You’ll feel like you’re right in the middle of the action, and every sound and movement will make your skin crawl.

We know that horror is one of the most popular genres out there, so we’ve made sure to include plenty of different stories for you to enjoy. Whether you’re a fan of zombies, demons, or ghosts, we have something that will scare you senseless.

This app is neither a game nor an Interactive Video. Just sit comfortably, choose a video and enjoy the scary experience!

Can you watch until the end?  

Download our app now and start watching today!

*3.5 GB Disk space needed for the 13 high quality movie downloads.(N streaming)
